@@ -38,3 +38,2 @@ - *

There exist different variants of these UUIDs. The methods - * of this class are for manipulating the Leach-Salz variant, although the - * constructors allow the creation of any variant of UUID (described below). + *

This class is primarily designed for manipulating Leach-Salz variant UUIDs, + * but it also supports the creation of UUIDs of other variants.
